hints.content:
Find $175$ on the scale of the graph.



[[☃ image 1]]

options.alt: A bar graph shows the horizontal axis labeled Place and the vertical axis labeled Number of Sunny Days in 2013. The horizontal axis is labeled, from left to right: Sun City, Shiny Town, Bright Village, and Light Land. The vertical axis is labeled from the bottom of the axis to the top of the axis as follows: 0, 25, 50, 75, 100, 125, 150, 175, 200, 225, 250, 275, and 300. The bar line for each place shows the following: Sun City bar line extends to 200, Shiny Town bar line extends to 275, Bright Village bar line extends to 250, and Light Land bar line extends to 150. A red line is drawn to the right from 175 across the bar graph. !

hints.content: On the scale, all bars ending below $175$ show amounts of less than $175$.

options.alt: A bar graph shows the horizontal axis labeled Place and the vertical axis labeled Number of Sunny Days in 2013. The horizontal axis is labeled, from left to right: Sun City, Shiny Town, Bright Village, and Light Land. The vertical axis is labeled from the bottom of the axis to the top of the axis as follows: 0, 25, 50, 75, 100, 125, 150, 175, 200, 225, 250, 275, and 300. The bar line for each place shows the following: Sun City bar line extends to 200, Shiny Town bar line extends to 275, Bright Village bar line extends to 250, and Light Land bar line extends to 150. A red line is drawn to the right from 175 across the bar graph. Light Land bar below the red line is highlighted. !

hints.content: Light Land had fewer than $175$ sunny days in $2013$s.

question.content:
Enzo counted the number of sunny days each of his favorite towns had in the year $2013$ and graphed the results.


[[☃ image 1]]

**Which of the following places had fewer than $175$ sunny days in $2013$?**

[[☃ radio 1]]

options.alt: A bar graph shows the horizontal axis labeled Place and the vertical axis labeled Number of Sunny Days in 2013. The horizontal axis is labeled, from left to right: Sun City, Shiny Town, Bright Village, and Light Land. The vertical axis is labeled from the bottom of the axis to the top of the axis as follows: 0, 25, 50, 75, 100, 125, 150, 175, 200, 225, 250, 275, and 300. The bar line for each place shows the following: Sun City bar line extends to 200, Shiny Town bar line extends to 275, Bright Village bar line extends to 250, and Light Land bar line extends to 150. !
